attributes.action: Incease the speed limiters of HGVs useing mainly motorways from 54mph to 65 mph to help with congestion
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If HGVs useing the motorway system could go at different speeds instead of the 54 mph which the limiters are suppost to be set, this would help with congestion. Going up to 11 mph faster would not cause more accidents in my oppiinion

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
